title: Reaction
desc:
- When in a player's hand, 🏓 cards cannot be played. Instead, they have a "Trigger" condition that, once met, makes the 🏓 instantly and automatically activate its effect.
- Once activated, any 🏓 card will place itself on top of the Play Pile, regardless of top color/number.
- If multiple 🏓 cards activate at once, they do so in random order.
- <:red:1106234051129507932> <:white:1107514189574045726> <:brown:1107516362903007232> <:orange:1106716206905438231> can be played on 🏓
